description: drawing of a courtyard surrounded by a building with an arc at the bottom, center; grey and black with pink/purple detailing in the archways
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn. (until d. 2012); by descent to his daughter Catherine Andrus, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
text: Christine Chagnoux is best known as a children’s book illustrator, but she also make whimsical drawings of greater sophistication. Here we have a bird’s-eye view of the Louvre, the palatial art museum in the center of Paris.
title: The Louvre
